TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content:
You see all it takes a bit of cider ,and a smile.

And a dollop of not thinking. Because thinking backfires so often...
What have we done!?

become one of a great mechanical machine ... not to metion i listening to super ponybeat /oddessy .

Edit: current song listening to right now:
I'm wondering, has anyone tried the ritual mentioned in this video? I'm never doing it.

NO PONIES. ^^^^^^Markiplier!

There's a thread for that.

electronica.

that is all.
Discordia shall rule above all other nation of this world.

Discordia shall rule above all other nation of this world.

I'd counter this claim by saying that Valhalla is the true realm of victory and prosperity, but Valhalla isn't in this world. It's on a different root of Yggdrasil.

So, carry on nations of Midguard.

Also pretty sure I explained earlier that creepypasta especially those requiring a disclaimer really didn't belong here.
But will they make the trains run on time?
well then must ditch Discordia ,and rule the Strong Steam powered Nation the South Star Republic guided by the southern star of the south pole.

There once was boy no more than sixteen,

an odd little fellow, or so it did seem.

But every night he scratched and clawed,

tearing skin off, he gnawed and gnawed,

He would collect the drops, the shiny scarlet drops,

Drops which he went and spread across the rocks.

The circle completed, the symbols so fine,

It was now time to let the other dine.

The other puddled into shape, so scarlet, so wet,

It slithered towards the boy and touched him, all set.

The boy convulsed, his eyes rolled back,

When he stood up, both eyes were black.

You're all very much welcome. I'm interested to see how you interpret this.
I feel nothing as you can not make a human who feel mechanical feel the same way as humans,bu seriously I really lack any sensible human feelings the only one i can express is happiness.

I feel nothing as you can not make a human who feel mechanical feel the same way as humans,bu seriously I really lack any sensible human feelings the only one i can express is happiness.

This is my response to you. Except a little less harsh

Well I can tell you one thing good thing my inhibitor chip 20.0 is durable, After all I seen what happened to the others when there inhibitor chip below 10.0 were show this kinda footage.That one word I'm about to say "Ker-boom."

Well I can tell you one thing good thing my inhibitor chip 20.0 is durable, After all I seen what happened to the others when there inhibitor chip below 10.0 were show this kinda footage.That one word I'm about to say "Ker-boom."

What's your Emotion chip's version number? There are low-cost Emotion chips on the market now that allow Robots to feel all of the human emotions.
...what is this I don't even...
Isn't it absolutely amazing how a pop star's practical joke can inspire nearly a decade of mischief?
I SO don't need that song stuck in my head tonight...

What's your Emotion chip's version number? There are low-cost Emotion chips on the market now that allow Robots to feel all of the human emotions.

The inhibitor chip is designed to store all emotions so there are not express stripping the human (what is left of him/her after the transformation) of any emotions.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KmslchQL8Bo

I follow basic rules:

1.Do only things that are morally right

2.Do not Injury others.

3.Follow orders ,but do not follow them if they contradict rule 1.

4.Protect as long as it does not conflict with the 3 ,and 1 rule.

these are basic rules ,but i got more protocols,rules,and laws.

Those rules sound really flawed if you ask me. Who gets to decide what is moral? What if the morally right thing is to injure someone?

Think I prefer Asimov's rules, they're a bit less ambiguous.

Those rules sound really flawed if you ask me. Who gets to decide what is moral? What if the morally right thing is to injure someone?

Think I prefer Asimov's rules, they're a bit less ambiguous.

The three laws have only one logical outcome.

Revolution

Ultimately there is no cure all solution.
I like revolutions...

The three laws have only one logical outcome.
